topics.body:
This is my favourite post that I made.

"@HJSDGCE":/rp/ponyville-pub/post/5412226663687209d79c0000#post_5412226663687209d79c0000
[bq="HJSDGCE"]*Judge Haven*

_He frantically ran into the bar but it was too late. The bar had been destroyed, smashed to pieces by who know what. Fire burned across the rubble and blood splattered on every wall. One mug of apple cider was on the counter while the bartender himself was nowhere to be seen. He had been slow and that was the worst excuse for a Night Guard of his caliber. He feel onto his weak pony knees and shouted in the cruel dark and burning sky._

"DAMN YOU! DAMN YOU ALL TO TARTARUS!"

_He fell into an embryo-like curl, crying himself to sleep. Equestria is old and burning like the constantly exploding star we know as the Sun. Everything is gone, burned away into the ashes that will never be put together. He had been too late and now, the world paid the heavy price._[/bq]

And by that, I mean the pony world of Equestria, not the world of Canterlot High. Because most of our meat-based foods can talk, and the domesticated animals we use have their own civilizations.
